# Sveti Sava Oplenac - Serbian Folklore Toronto

> Serbian Folklore Ensemble & Cultural Association serving the Greater Toronto Area since 2016

## About Us

Sveti Sava Oplenac is the premier Serbian folklore ensemble in Toronto and Mississauga, Ontario, Canada. We preserve and celebrate Serbian cultural heritage through traditional kolo dance, music, and community events.

## What We Offer

- **Kolo Dance Classes**: Traditional Serbian folk dance instruction for all ages and skill levels
- **Group 3 (Ages 3-7)**: Introduction to Serbian folklore for young children
- **Group 2 (Ages 8-12)**: Youth development in traditional dance
- **Group 1 (Ages 13+)**: Advanced performance-level training for teens and adults
- **Recreational Group**: Open to all ages, focused on fun and community

## Location

All Saints Serbian Orthodox Church
2520 Dixie Road
Mississauga, Ontario L4Y 2A1
Canada

## Practice Schedule

- Saturdays: 11:30 AM onwards (varies by group)
